title: Water Crystals (non toxic) - 100g - with a woodies or superworms order
cleaned_text: Description Perfect source of moisture for your feeder insects. 100g non-toxic water crystals. Directions: 1/4 teaspoon to half a cup (125ml) of water soaked overnight. (Guide only). ** This product is currently only available with a superworms or woodies order ** Please add a woodies or superworms product to your cart to purchase.
